From Wiktionary, the free dictionary

French

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

aval + -er

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /a.va.le/
  • Audio:(file)
  • Audio (France (Vosges)):(file)
  • Audio (France):(file)
  • Audio (France (Vosges)):(file)
  • Audio (France (Lyon)):(file)
  • Audio (France (Somain)):(file)

Verb

[edit]

avaler

  1. (ambitransitive) to swallow
  2. (transitive, figuratively) to believe
  3. (transitive, figuratively) to support
  4. (transitive, figuratively) to approve, endorse
  5. (intransitive, sex, informal) to swallow cum, to swallow
    Est-ce que tu avales ? ― Do you swallow?

1 The French gerund is usable only with the preposition en.
2 In less formal writing or speech, these tenses may be found to have been replaced in the following way:
past historic → present perfect
past anterior → pluperfect
imperfect subjunctive → present subjunctive
pluperfect subjunctive → past subjunctive

(Christopher Kendris [1995], Master the Basics: French, pp. 77, 78, 79, 81).

Derived terms

[edit]
  • avalable
  • avaleuse

Further reading

[edit]

Anagrams

[edit]
  • lavera

Old French

[edit]

Verb

[edit]

avaler

  1. to descend; to go down

Conjugation

[edit]

This verb conjugates as a first-group verb ending in -er. The forms that would normally end in *-als, *-alt are modified to aus, aut. Old French conjugation varies significantly by date and by region. The following conjugation should be treated as a guide.

    Conjugation of avaler (see also Appendix:Old French verbs)
simple compound
infinitive avaler avoir avalé
gerund en avalant gerund of avoir + past participle
present participle avalant
past participle avalé
person singular plural
first second third first second third
indicative jo tu il nos vos il
simple
tenses 		present aval avales avale avalons avalez avalent
imperfect avaloie, avaleie, avaloe, avaleve avaloies, avaleies, avaloes, avaleves avaloit, avaleit, avalot, avaleve avaliiens, avaliens avaliiez, avaliez avaloient, avaleient, avaloent, avalevent
preterite avalai avalas avala avalames avalastes avalerent
future avalerai avaleras avalera avalerons avaleroiz, avalereiz, avalerez avaleront
conditional avaleroie, avalereie avaleroies, avalereies avaleroit, avalereit avaleriiens, avaleriens avaleriiez, avaleriez avaleroient, avalereient

tenses 		present perfect present tense of avoir + past participle
pluperfect imperfect tense of avoir + past participle
